displaying the number on screen). Of course Python and most programming 
language interpreters are faster though. Great with though :). If using 
c-like ...Full ReviewGood app, lots of features. The one thing I don't like about this app is 
that it's alittle slower than it should be (half a second delay between 
displaying the number on screen). Of course Python and most programming 
language interpreters are faster though. Great with though :). If using 
c-like syntax please use double instead of float. There is only a 6 decimal 
places and the could be 15 dp

Absolutely awesome. Really no feature left behind. But has some glitches. Apart from ads, it lags in multiple cases. While taking inputs it lags a little, although it calculates & shows results without any lag. But most of the problems occur when switching tasks. As I need to switch between any task...Full ReviewAbsolutely awesome. Really no feature left behind. But has some glitches. Apart from ads, it lags in multiple cases. While taking inputs it lags a little, although it calculates & shows results without any lag. But most of the problems occur when switching tasks. As I need to switch between any task like PDF Reader & FSC, often I find the calculator keys to be jumbled up. Doesn't work properly without restarting the app. Probably the glitches are because there are too many features within a small size. You can increase size to 5-7MB, but please remove the glitches. It's my physical calculator replacement now.
On the edge of perfection.... But the only problem I faced were the glitches (minors) and the pop-up adds (these are really annoying)    I hope the developers rectify them soon!

Interface sucks. Nothing scientific about it. Only for maths. Can't solve an equation with a variable(only 1). A lot of constants are missing, like Planck's constant. Can't solve Trigonometric equation. When I open the app from regents the tray of Operations just becomes rectangular, and each rectan...Full ReviewInterface sucks. Nothing scientific about it. Only for maths. Can't solve an equation with a variable(only 1). A lot of constants are missing, like Planck's constant. Can't solve Trigonometric equation. When I open the app from regents the tray of Operations just becomes rectangular, and each rectangle has a single a function.  Calculator only useful for newborn babies.

Better than the others. It does all the important stuff. The shortcuts for common types of equation are nice too. For some reason though it defaults to work in degrees. This is easily fixed in the settings but is not how a scientific calculator should work by default. Also it has a lot of functions, but some of them are ra...Full ReviewIt does all the important stuff. The shortcuts for common types of equation are nice too. For some reason though it defaults to work in degrees. This is easily fixed in the settings but is not how a scientific calculator should work by default. Also it has a lot of functions, but some of them are rather pointless. It has stats functions for instance but no stats mode. It's also easy to slip up and miss the rather small arrow keys when you're in a hurry, which results in the wrong keys being pressed.
